snippet: BRACONI--Frank. A man of peace who fought for his country in WWII died at 92. William James said we cannot know human nature until the last man has lived and had his say. Frank's life spoke that human nature is honest, generous and kind. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BRACONI--Frank. A man of peace who fought for his country in WWII died at 92. William James said we cannot know human nature until the last man has lived and had his say. Frank's life spoke that human nature is honest, generous and kind. 1/3
